short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip all the annoying extras offered when booking Ryanair flights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works on ryanair.com by helping you avoid filling out all the details about the flight you're taking. It will skip all the extras that Ryanair offers such as paid seats, additional luggage, additional insurance or car hire. It will also fill out the passenger details from the passengers saved in your myRyanair account, in order in which they appear there.

How to use:
Go to ryanair.com, make sure you are logged in to your myRyanair account (because the passenger details are filled from there), make sure the site language is set to English (as this helps find the buttons to click), select your flights and click the skipping button.

This extension is in beta phase, you can report bugs and feature requests in the Support tab.
